Return / Replacement Policy

** If your product arrives damaged or faulty, please do not accept it. If you did accept it, please get in contact with our customer service team on +8801971663839 **

Hometex Bangladesh's 7 Days Easy Return Guarantee Includes:
. Easy Returns if not satisfied with Product's quality, size.
. 100% Money Back Without Shipping Cost if Return/Refund issue can't resolved in maximum 15 days*For credit card payment return may take longer depending on Commercial Banks
. You have to notify us within 24 hours after receiving the Products from the delivery man.
. Hometex Bangladesh appreciates every single time you trust us with your purchase. We want you to have an absolutely hassle-free shopping experience. We assure you that all Products sold on hometex.ltd are BRAND NEW as well as 100% Q/C checked. In case the Products you have received is 'Damaged', 'Defective' or 'Not as Described', you can return it within 7 days and we will solve your problem within 5 days (Outside Dhaka 10 days), after receiving your notification. You can have Replacement or Refund.

Return can be occurred in two stages:

  • At the time of delivery
  • After receiving a delivery (Have to notify within 24 hours)

*In each case, customers have to bear the shipping cost only.

You can return the Products if:

  • You received a defective Product
  • You received a physically damaged Product
  • You are unhappy with the Products quality
  • The Product is different from description on the website
  • Size or Fit issue

All items which can be resold are always eligible for return. Except the following:

  • Items that have been worn or washed
  • Products which were sold as combos or in sets, are not eligible for return/replacement as individual items
  • Products should not be used
  • Products must be in their original condition
  • Items should be unused, unaltered, unsoiled Products with their original tags
  • Item must be in the original packaging, in the original condition
  • Seal open branded items cannot be returned in case of not being happy with the Products as they can’t be resold. Except if the Products is damaged or torn inside the packet.

The customer must ensure the item is packed and delivered securely; hometex.ltd will not be held responsible if the goods get damaged on their return to hometex.ltd office/outlet.

Returns are easy, simply follow these steps-

  • With Order ID details and problem e-mail us at sales@hometex.ltd within 24 hour or just dial us here: +880197 166 38 39
  • We will confirm the return request and will inform you about the pickup process.
  • Please ensure that Products is in unused and original condition. Include all price tags, labels, original packing and invoice along with the Products.

Please note that you need to contact us within 24 hours after receiving a faulty or damaged Products, it is very necessary that you contact us via mail and also you have to send us the Products within 7 days. We will bear the return delivery charge.

Refund Policy

hometex.ltd provides the most hassle-free online shopping experience. Your money is safe with us. Refunds are issued when

  • If we cannot provide replacement
  • After return if you want your money back
  • If a different Product is delivered to you.
  • If you changes mind & can cancel booking before the Products are already shipped
  • If you don't want replacement.
  • Most refunds are fully refunded in 7 days after we receive and process your return.
  • If you pay us by using card then we will request a refund in bank which will take 7-10 working days. (Credit card payment return may take longer depending on Commercial Banks)
  • If you pay us by bkash/nagad/rocket then your money will be sent via bkash/nagad/rocket in your desired account within 2-5 working days.

Refunds are easy, simply follow these steps

  • Provide us with Order ID details and e-mail : sales@hometex.ltd
    Or just dial us here: +880197 166 38 39
  • We will confirm the Refund request and will inform you about the process.

Please note that if we send you faulty Products then we will bear the delivery charge and transaction cost for credit card.
